mapper.insert: insert into client (client_name, client_id, client_password, client_birthday, client_phoneNumber, client_address, client_registerDate) values (#{client_name}, #{client_id}, #{client_password}, #{client_birthday}, #{client_phoneNumber}, #{client_address}, #{client_registerDate})
mapper.select: select client_id from client where client_name = #{param1} and client_phoneNumber = #{param2}
mapper.update: update client set client_password = #{param1} where client_id = #{param2}
mapper.select: select count(*) from client where client_id = #{param1} and client_email = #{param2}
